job_title: Sr. .NET Developer with Oracle DB & BizTalk
jd: From: Srikanth Vanam, Sligosoft srikanth.vanam@sligosoft.com Reply to: srikanth.vanam@sligosoft.com Greetings from Sligo Software Solutions, Inc. !!SLIGO is a Software Development & IT Consulting company. We have around 100+ IT associates working with our esteemed clients across several domains such as IT, Banking, Healthcare, and Government. We have an urgent requirement for Sr. .NET Developer with Oracle DB & BizTalk position with our client. Role: Sr. .NET Developer with Oracle DB & BizTalkLocation: Albany, New YorkDuration: 24 MonthsJob ID: SLG - 19 - 9901Client: NY StateRespond by Date: 10/09/24 5:00 PM Description System Developer for CCFS - This position is for a Systems Developer Expert to develop/code with the development team for the Fingerprint Information Processing System (FIPS). FIPS is the database of record for adoptive/foster parents, day care providers and mentors that require a criminal history background check be performed as mandated by law.Duties Work in coordination with a team of developers to write the new Facility Application Management system in ASP.net MVC.Work with Business Analyst on analysis and logical design.Perform unit testing and correct all identified bugs.Perform complex VB.Net coding.Assist with responding to CCFS data requests.The individual in this position will work under the direction of a Technical Lead, Project Manager & Software Architect.Perform writing of complex stored procedures/triggers in an Oracle database utilizing PL/SQLMandatory Requirements Experience (12+ Years)Develops and implements applications and programs for the backend processing systems used in businesses and organizations.Requirements This is an 100% Onsite84 months experience developing N-Tier .net web applications72 months experience with PL/SQL writing packages stored procedures and triggers.72 months experience utilizing BizTalk72 months experience developing in C#72 months experience with Oracle Database administration, design and architectureBachelor’s DegreeRésuméCopy of Candidate Identification(i.e., Driver’s License/Green Card/Visa and Passport if applicable)Any documents referenced in the above Requested Qualifications(i.e., professional certifications, degrees, etc.)ThanksSrikanth Vanam
